title: First Sight
description: Maddy Smith writes for a trendy website in Washington DC, has two fabulous best friends, and her own apartment. When her handsome new colleague Travis Emerson moves to town, Maddy soon finds herself wishing for something more. After a misunderstanding between them occurs, not only is her hope for a relationship ruined, but their friendship is in jeopardy as well.Is any chance that Maddy had with Travis over? Or could he possibly be what sheâ€™s been looking for all along?This edition features the alternate cover for First Sight (ASIN: B00AFHI2S0).
author: Laura  Donohue
